name: Ball E 3A11
description:
Have you mastered the standard brick-breaker game? Ready for a new Challenge & FUN? Get BallE 3A11 Now! The classic arcade game, is back with a breathtaking new version!!!

Inspired by legendary Arkanoid Brick Breaker game, BallE is actually MUCH better. You don’t have the paddle, but instead, you’ll get a collection of different types of balls. Each ball has its own power and strategy. Come play and unlock a new surprise ball everyday!

HOW TO PLAY
Hold to aim the brick, release to shoot and watch the beauty when the balls hit, bounce and destroy those bricks.

The game’s objective is to eliminate the BRICKS on the screen as many as possible before they reach the bottom.

Which level can you reach? Take your time to aim and think strategically. Don’t forget to make the most out of the power-ups with magnificent effects.

BallE 3A11 is extremely portable! All you need is a mobile phone or tablet and you have a wealth of brick blocks to solve at your fingertips, wherever you are. You can play it while watching movies or queuing or shopping. Just enjoy the fun anywhere, anytime!

BallE FEATURES:
◉ Endless gameplay
◉ Unique ball’s collection to help you unlock the constellations :)
◉ Easy and fun to play
◉ Get outstanding Achievements to claim your bonus
◉ Quality recreation confirmed
◉ Soothing design helps you relax while playing
◉ Cool animated effects
◉ Challenge your friends with the best high score
◉ Anytime, anywhere you can play BallE.

Let’s discover a whole new World of brick breaker and bubble shooter games with BallE. We're sure you will have FUN!

~ BallE team ~
